Evince
Evince is a document viewer capable of displaying multiple and single page document formats like PDF and Postscript.
  • Main Page
  • Related Pages
  • Namespaces
  • Data Structures
  • Files
  • File List
  • Globals

gint _ev_view_get_caret_cursor_offset_at_doc_point ( EvView *  view,
gint  page,
gdouble  doc_x,
gdouble  doc_y 
)

Definition at line 4454 of file ev-view.c.

4458 {
4459  EvRectangle *areas = NULL;
4460  guint n_areas = 0;
4461  gint offset = -1;
4462  gint first_line_offset;
4463  gint last_line_offset = -1;
4464  EvRectangle *rect;
4465  guint i;
4466 
4467  ev_page_cache_get_text_layout (view->page_cache, page, &areas, &n_areas);
4468  if (!areas)
4469  return -1;
4470 
4471  i = 0;
4472  while (i < n_areas && offset == -1) {
4473  rect = areas + i;
4474 
4475  first_line_offset = -1;
4476  while (doc_y >= rect->y1 && doc_y <= rect->y2) {
4477  if (first_line_offset == -1) {
4478  if (doc_x <= rect->x1) {
4479  /* Location is before the start of the line */
4480  if (last_line_offset != -1) {
4481  EvRectangle *last = areas + last_line_offset;
4482  gint dx1, dx2;
4483 
4484  /* If there's a previous line, check distances */
4485 
4486  dx1 = doc_x - last->x2;
4487  dx2 = rect->x1 - doc_x;
4488 
4489  if (dx1 < dx2)
4490  offset = last_line_offset;
4491  else
4492  offset = i;
4493  } else {
4494  offset = i;
4495  }
4496 
4497  last_line_offset = i + 1;
4498  break;
4499  }
4500  first_line_offset = i;
4501  }
4502  last_line_offset = i + 1;
4503 
4504  if (doc_x >= rect->x1 && doc_x <= rect->x2) {
4505  /* Location is inside the line. Position the caret before
4506  * or after the character, depending on whether the point
4507  * falls within the left or right half of the bounding box.
4508  */
4509  if (doc_x <= rect->x1 + (rect->x2 - rect->x1) / 2)
4510  offset = i;
4511  else
4512  offset = i + 1;
4513  break;
4514  }
4515 
4516  i++;
4517  rect = areas + i;
4518  }
4519 
4520  if (first_line_offset == -1)
4521  i++;
4522  }
4523 
4524  if (last_line_offset == -1)
4525  return -1;
4526 
4527  if (offset == -1)
4528  offset = last_line_offset;
4529 
4530  return offset;
4531 }

1313  GtkBorder border;
1314  double x, y, view_x, view_y;
1315 
1316  switch (view->rotation) {
1317  case 0:
1318  x = doc_point->x;
1319  y = doc_point->y;
1320 
1321  break;
1322  case 90: {
1323  gdouble width;
1324 
1325  get_doc_page_size (view, page, &width, NULL);
1326  x = width - doc_point->y;

1335  y = height - doc_point->y;

1343  y = height - doc_point->x;
1344  }

1353  view_y = CLAMP ((gint)(y * view->scale + 0.5), 0, page_area.height);
1354  view_point->x = view_x + page_area.x + border.left;
1355  view_point->y = view_y + page_area.y + border.top;
1356 }

static gboolean blink_cb ( EvView *  view)
static

Definition at line 3381 of file ev-view.c.

3382 {
3383  gint blink_timeout;
3384  guint blink_time;
3385 
3386  blink_timeout = get_cursor_blink_timeout_id (view);
3387  if (view->cursor_blink_time > 1000 * blink_timeout && blink_timeout < G_MAXINT / 1000) {
3388  /* We've blinked enough without the user doing anything, stop blinking */
3389  show_cursor (view);
3390  view->cursor_blink_timeout_id = 0;
3391 
3392  return FALSE;
3393  }
3394 
3395  blink_time = get_cursor_blink_time (view);
3396  if (view->cursor_visible) {
3397  hide_cursor (view);
3398  blink_time *= CURSOR_OFF_MULTIPLIER;
3399  } else {
3400  show_cursor (view);
3401  view->cursor_blink_time += blink_time;
3402  blink_time *= CURSOR_ON_MULTIPLIER;
3403  }
3404 
3405  view->cursor_blink_timeout_id = gdk_threads_add_timeout (blink_time / CURSOR_DIVIDER, (GSourceFunc)blink_cb, view);
3406 
3407  return FALSE;
3408 }

static GList* compute_new_selection ( EvView *  view,
EvSelectionStyle  style,
GdkPoint *  start,
GdkPoint *  stop 
)
static

Definition at line 7754 of file ev-view.c.

7758 {
7759  int i, first, last;
7760  GList *list = NULL;
7761 
7762  /* First figure out the range of pages the selection affects. */
7763  if (!get_selection_page_range (view, style, start, stop, &first, &last))
7764  return list;
7765 
7766  /* Now create a list of EvViewSelection's for the affected
7767  * pages. This could be an empty list, a list of just one
7768  * page or a number of pages.*/
7769  for (i = first; i <= last; i++) {
7770  EvViewSelection *selection;
7771  GdkRectangle page_area;
7772  GtkBorder border;
7773  GdkPoint *point;
7774  gdouble width, height;
7775 
7776  get_doc_page_size (view, i, &width, &height);
7777 
7778  selection = g_slice_new0 (EvViewSelection);
7779  selection->page = i;
7780  selection->style = style;
7781  selection->rect.x1 = selection->rect.y1 = 0;
7782  selection->rect.x2 = width;
7783  selection->rect.y2 = height;
7784 
7785  ev_view_get_page_extents (view, i, &page_area, &border);
7786  page_area.x -= border.left;
7787  page_area.y -= border.top;
7788  page_area.width += border.left + border.right;
7789  page_area.height += border.top + border.bottom;
7790 
7791  if (gdk_rectangle_point_in (&page_area, start))
7792  point = start;
7793  else
7794  point = stop;
7795 
7796  if (i == first) {
7797  _ev_view_transform_view_point_to_doc_point (view, point, &page_area,
7798  &selection->rect.x1,
7799  &selection->rect.y1);
7800  selection->rect.x1 = MAX (selection->rect.x1 - border.left, 0);
7801  selection->rect.y1 = MAX (selection->rect.y1 - border.top, 0);
7802  }
7803 
7804  /* If the selection is contained within just one page,
7805  * make sure we don't write 'start' into both points
7806  * in selection->rect. */
7807  if (first == last)
7808  point = stop;
7809 
7810  if (i == last) {
7811  _ev_view_transform_view_point_to_doc_point (view, point, &page_area,
7812  &selection->rect.x2,
7813  &selection->rect.y2);
7814  selection->rect.x2 = MAX (selection->rect.x2 - border.right, 0);
7815  selection->rect.y2 = MAX (selection->rect.y2 - border.bottom, 0);
7816  }
7817 
7818  list = g_list_prepend (list, selection);
7819  }
7820 
7821  return g_list_reverse (list);
7822 }

GtkScrollType  scroll 
)
static

849 {
850  GtkWidget *widget = GTK_WIDGET (view);

852  cairo_region_t *text_region, *region;
853  GtkAllocation allocation;
854  gint page;
855  GdkRectangle rect;
856  EvRectangle doc_rect;
857  GdkRectangle page_area;
858  GtkBorder border;
859  gdouble fraction = 1.0;
860 
861  if (scroll != GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD && scroll != GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_FORWARD)
862  return gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment);
863 
864  page = scroll == GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD ? view->start_page : view->end_page;
865 
866  text_region = ev_page_cache_get_text_mapping (view->page_cache, page);
867  if (!text_region || cairo_region_is_empty (text_region))
868  return gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment);
869 
870  gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
871  ev_view_get_page_extents (view, page, &page_area, &border);
872  rect.x = page_area.x + view->scroll_x;
873  rect.y = view->scroll_y + (scroll == GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD ? 5 : allocation.height - 5);
874  rect.width = page_area.width;
875  rect.height = 1;
876  _ev_view_transform_view_rect_to_doc_rect (view, &rect, &page_area, &doc_rect);
877 
878  /* Convert the doc rectangle into a GdkRectangle */
879  rect.x = doc_rect.x1;
880  rect.y = doc_rect.y1;
881  rect.width = doc_rect.x2 - doc_rect.x1;
882  rect.height = MAX (1, doc_rect.y2 - doc_rect.y1);
883  region = cairo_region_create_rectangle (&rect);
884 
885  cairo_region_intersect (region, text_region);
886  if (cairo_region_num_rectangles (region)) {
887  EvRenderContext *rc;
888  EvPage *ev_page;
889  cairo_region_t *sel_region;
890 
891  cairo_region_get_rectangle (region, 0, &rect);
892  ev_page = ev_document_get_page (view->document, page);
893  rc = ev_render_context_new (ev_page, view->rotation, view->scale);
894  g_object_unref (ev_page);
895  /* Get the selection region to know the height of the line */
896  doc_rect.x1 = doc_rect.x2 = rect.x + 0.5;
897  doc_rect.y1 = doc_rect.y2 = rect.y + 0.5;
898 
899  ev_document_doc_mutex_lock ();
900  sel_region = ev_selection_get_selection_region (EV_SELECTION (view->document),
901  rc, EV_SELECTION_STYLE_LINE,
902  &doc_rect);
903  ev_document_doc_mutex_unlock ();
904 
905  g_object_unref (rc);
906 
907  if (cairo_region_num_rectangles (sel_region) > 0) {
908  cairo_region_get_rectangle (sel_region, 0, &rect);
909  fraction = 1 - (rect.height / gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment));
910  }
911  cairo_region_destroy (sel_region);
912  }
913  cairo_region_destroy (region);
914 
915  return gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment) * fraction;
916 
917 }

5983  return;

5986  page,
5987  view->scale);

5990  width, height);
5991  return;
5992  }

5995  page,
5996  view->scale);

5998  double scale_x, scale_y;
5999  GdkRGBA color;
6000 
6001  scale_x = (gdouble)width / cairo_image_surface_get_width (page_surface);
6002  scale_y = (gdouble)height / cairo_image_surface_get_height (page_surface);
6003  _ev_view_get_selection_colors (view, &color, NULL);
6004  draw_selection_region (cr, region, &color, real_page_area.x, real_page_area.y,
6005  scale_x, scale_y);
6006  }
6007  }
6008 }

5847

5849  cairo_translate (cr, x, y);

5852  gdouble scale_x, scale_y;
5853

5855  scale_y = (gdouble)target_height / height;
5856  cairo_pattern_set_filter (cairo_get_source (cr),
5857  CAIRO_FILTER_FAST);
5858  cairo_scale (cr, scale_x, scale_y);
5859 
5860  offset_x /= scale_x;
5861  offset_y /= scale_y;
5862  }

1052  value = MAX (gtk_adjustment_get_lower (adjustment), rect->y - MARGIN);

1068  allocation.width + MARGIN);

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static gboolean ev_view_autoscroll_cb ( EvView *  view)
static

Definition at line 6788 of file ev-view.c.

6789 {
6790  gdouble speed, value;
6791 
6792  /* If the user stops autoscrolling, autoscrolling will be
6793  * set to false but the timeout will continue; stop the timeout: */
6794  if (!view->scroll_info.autoscrolling) {
6795  view->scroll_info.timeout_id = 0;
6796  return FALSE;
6797  }
6798 
6799  if (view->scroll_info.last_y > view->scroll_info.start_y &&
6800  (view->scroll_info.last_y < view->scroll_info.start_y))
6801  return TRUE;
6802 
6803  /* Replace 100 with your speed of choice: The lower the faster.
6804  * Replace 3 with another speed of choice: The higher, the faster it accelerated
6805  * based on the distance of the starting point from the mouse
6806  * (All also effected by the timeout interval of this callback) */
6807 
6808  if (view->scroll_info.start_y > view->scroll_info.last_y)
6809  speed = -pow ((((gdouble)view->scroll_info.start_y - view->scroll_info.last_y) / 100), 3);
6810  else
6811  speed = pow ((((gdouble)view->scroll_info.last_y - view->scroll_info.start_y) / 100), 3);
6812 
6813  value = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
6814  value = CLAMP (value + speed, 0,
6815  gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) -
6816  gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment));
6817  gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->vadjustment, value);
6818 
6819  return TRUE;
6820 
6821 }

GdkEventButton *  event 
)

Definition at line 4611 of file ev-view.c.

4614  EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget);
4615 
4616  if (!view->document)
4617  return FALSE;
4618 
4619  if (!gtk_widget_has_focus (widget)) {
4620  gtk_widget_grab_focus (widget);
4621  }
4622 
4623  if (view->window_child_focus) {
4624  EvAnnotationWindow *window;
4625 
4626  window = EV_ANNOTATION_WINDOW (view->window_child_focus->window);
4627  ev_annotation_window_ungrab_focus (window);
4628  view->window_child_focus = NULL;
4629  }
4630

4632  view->selection_info.in_drag = FALSE;
4633 
4634  if (view->adding_annot)
4635  return FALSE;
4636 
4637  if (view->scroll_info.autoscrolling)
4638  return TRUE;
4639 
4640  switch (event->button) {
4641  case 1: {
4642  EvImage *image;
4643  EvAnnotation *annot;
4644  EvFormField *field;
4645  EvMapping *link;
4646  gint page;
4647 
4648  if (event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK)
4649  return ev_view_synctex_backward_search (view, event->x , event->y);
4650 
4651  if (EV_IS_SELECTION (view->document) && view->selection_info.selections) {
4652  if (event->type == GDK_3BUTTON_PRESS) {
4653  start_selection_for_event (view, event);
4654  } else if (location_in_selected_text (view,
4655  event->x + view->scroll_x,
4656  event->y + view->scroll_y)) {
4657  view->selection_info.in_drag = TRUE;
4658  } else {
4659  start_selection_for_event (view, event);
4660  if (position_caret_cursor_for_event (view, event, TRUE)) {
4661  view->cursor_blink_time = 0;
4662  ev_view_pend_cursor_blink (view);
4663  }
4664  }
4665  } else if ((annot = ev_view_get_annotation_at_location (view, event->x, event->y))) {
4666  ev_view_handle_annotation (view, annot, event->x, event->y, event->time);
4667  } else if ((field = ev_view_get_form_field_at_location (view, event->x, event->y))) {
4668  ev_view_remove_all (view);
4669  ev_view_handle_form_field (view, field);
4670  } else if ((link = get_link_mapping_at_location (view, event->x, event->y, &page))){
4671  ev_view_set_focused_element (view, link, page);
4672  } else if (!location_in_text (view, event->x + view->scroll_x, event->y + view->scroll_y) &&
4673  (image = ev_view_get_image_at_location (view, event->x, event->y))) {
4674  if (view->image_dnd_info.image)
4675  g_object_unref (view->image_dnd_info.image);
4676  view->image_dnd_info.image = g_object_ref (image);
4677  view->image_dnd_info.in_drag = TRUE;
4678 
4679  view->image_dnd_info.start.x = event->x + view->scroll_x;
4680  view->image_dnd_info.start.y = event->y + view->scroll_y;
4681  } else {
4682  ev_view_remove_all (view);
4683  ev_view_set_focused_element (view, NULL, -1);
4684 
4685  if (view->synctex_result) {
4686  g_free (view->synctex_result);
4687  view->synctex_result = NULL;
4688  gtk_widget_queue_draw (widget);
4689  }
4690 
4691  if (EV_IS_SELECTION (view->document))
4692  start_selection_for_event (view, event);
4693 
4694  if (position_caret_cursor_for_event (view, event, TRUE)) {
4695  view->cursor_blink_time = 0;
4696  ev_view_pend_cursor_blink (view);
4697  }
4698  }
4699  }
4700  return TRUE;
4701  case 2:
4702  /* use root coordinates as reference point because
4703  * scrolling changes window relative coordinates */
4704  view->drag_info.start.x = event->x_root;
4705  view->drag_info.start.y = event->y_root;
4706  view->drag_info.hadj = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment);
4707  view->drag_info.vadj = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
4708 
4709  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_DRAG);
4710  ev_view_set_focused_element_at_location (view, event->x, event->y);
4711  return TRUE;
4712  case 3:
4713  view->scroll_info.start_y = event->y;
4714  ev_view_set_focused_element_at_location (view, event->x, event->y);
4715  return ev_view_do_popup_menu (view, event->x, event->y);
4716  }
4717 
4718  return FALSE;
4719 }

static gboolean ev_view_drag_update_momentum ( EvView *  view)
static

Definition at line 4850 of file ev-view.c.

4851 {
4852  int i;
4853  if (!view->drag_info.in_drag)
4854  return FALSE;
4855 
4856  for (i = DRAG_HISTORY - 1; i > 0; i--) {
4857  view->drag_info.buffer[i].x = view->drag_info.buffer[i-1].x;
4858  view->drag_info.buffer[i].y = view->drag_info.buffer[i-1].y;
4859  }
4860 
4861  /* Momentum is a moving average of 10ms granularity over
4862  * the last 100ms with each 10ms stored in buffer.
4863  */
4864 
4865  view->drag_info.momentum.x = (view->drag_info.buffer[DRAG_HISTORY - 1].x - view->drag_info.buffer[0].x);
4866  view->drag_info.momentum.y = (view->drag_info.buffer[DRAG_HISTORY - 1].y - view->drag_info.buffer[0].y);
4867 
4868  return TRUE;

2252  }

gboolean ev_view_get_page_extents ( EvView *  view,
gint  page,
GdkRectangle *  page_area,
GtkBorder *  border 
)

Definition at line 1168 of file ev-view.c.

1172 {
1173  GtkWidget *widget;
1174  int width, height;
1175  GtkAllocation allocation;
1176 
1177  widget = GTK_WIDGET (view);
1178  gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
1179 
1180  /* Get the size of the page */
1181  ev_view_get_page_size (view, page, &width, &height);
1182  compute_border (view, border);
1183  page_area->width = width + border->left + border->right;
1184  page_area->height = height + border->top + border->bottom;
1185 
1186  if (view->continuous) {
1187  gint max_width;
1188  gint x, y;
1189  gboolean odd_left;
1190 
1191  ev_view_get_max_page_size (view, &max_width, NULL);
1192  max_width = max_width + border->left + border->right;
1193  /* Get the location of the bounding box */
1194  if (is_dual_page (view, &odd_left)) {
1195  x = view->spacing + ((page % 2 == !odd_left) ? 0 : 1) * (max_width + view->spacing);
1196  x = x + MAX (0, allocation.width - (max_width * 2 + view->spacing * 3)) / 2;
1197  if (page % 2 == !odd_left)
1198  x = x + (max_width - width - border->left - border->right);
1199  } else {
1200  x = view->spacing;
1201  x = x + MAX (0, allocation.width - (width + view->spacing * 2)) / 2;
1202  }
1203 
1204  get_page_y_offset (view, page, &y);
1205 
1206  page_area->x = x;
1207  page_area->y = y;
1208  } else {
1209  gint x, y;
1210  gboolean odd_left;
1211 
1212  if (is_dual_page (view, &odd_left)) {
1213  gint width_2, height_2;
1214  gint max_width = width;
1215  gint max_height = height;
1216  GtkBorder overall_border;
1217  gint other_page;
1218 
1219  other_page = (page % 2 == !odd_left) ? page + 1: page - 1;
1220 
1221  /* First, we get the bounding box of the two pages */
1222  if (other_page < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document)
1223  && (0 <= other_page)) {
1224  ev_view_get_page_size (view, other_page,
1225  &width_2, &height_2);
1226  if (width_2 > width)
1227  max_width = width_2;
1228  if (height_2 > height)
1229  max_height = height_2;
1230  }
1231  compute_border (view, &overall_border);
1232 
1233  /* Find the offsets */
1234  x = view->spacing;
1235  y = view->spacing;
1236 
1237  /* Adjust for being the left or right page */
1238  if (page % 2 == !odd_left)
1239  x = x + max_width - width;
1240  else
1241  x = x + (max_width + overall_border.left + overall_border.right) + view->spacing;
1242 
1243  y = y + (max_height - height)/2;
1244 
1245  /* Adjust for extra allocation */
1246  x = x + MAX (0, allocation.width -
1247  ((max_width + overall_border.left + overall_border.right) * 2 + view->spacing * 3))/2;
1248  y = y + MAX (0, allocation.height - (height + view->spacing * 2))/2;
1249  } else {
1250  x = view->spacing;
1251  y = view->spacing;
1252 
1253  /* Adjust for extra allocation */
1254  x = x + MAX (0, allocation.width - (width + border->left + border->right + view->spacing * 2))/2;
1255  y = y + MAX (0, allocation.height - (height + border->top + border->bottom + view->spacing * 2))/2;
1256  }
1257 
1258  page_area->x = x;
1259  page_area->y = y;
1260  }
1261 
1262  return TRUE;
1263 }

static gint ev_view_get_scrollbar_size ( EvView *  view,
GtkOrientation  orientation 
)
static

Definition at line 448 of file ev-view.c.

450 {
451  GtkWidget *widget = GTK_WIDGET (view);
452  GtkWidget *sb;
453  GtkWidget *swindow = gtk_widget_get_parent (GTK_WIDGET (view));
454  GtkAllocation allocation;
455  GtkRequisition req;
456  gint spacing;
457 
458  if (!GTK_IS_SCROLLED_WINDOW (swindow))
459  return 0;
460 
461  gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
462 
463  if (orientation == GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL) {
464  if (allocation.height >= view->requisition.height)
465  sb = gtk_scrolled_window_get_vscrollbar (GTK_SCROLLED_WINDOW (swindow));
466  else
467  return 0;
468  } else {
469  if (allocation.width >= view->requisition.width)
470  sb = gtk_scrolled_window_get_hscrollbar (GTK_SCROLLED_WINDOW (swindow));
471  else
472  return 0;
473  }
474 
475  gtk_widget_style_get (swindow, "scrollbar_spacing", &spacing, NULL);
476  gtk_widget_get_preferred_size (sb, &req, NULL);
477 
478  return (orientation == GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL ? req.width : req.height) + spacing;
479 }

2678  while (children) {
2679  EvViewWindowChild *child;
2680 
2681  child = (EvViewWindowChild *)children->data;
2682  children = children->next;
2683 
2684  if (child->window == window)
2685  return child;
2686  }
2687 
2688  return NULL;
2689 }

1870  return;

1898  ev_document_layers_hide_layer (document_layers, EV_LAYER (l->data));

1903  EvLayer *layer = EV_LAYER (l->data);
1904 
1905  if (ev_document_layers_layer_is_visible (document_layers, layer)) {
1906  ev_document_layers_hide_layer (document_layers, layer);
1907  } else {
1908  ev_document_layers_show_layer (document_layers, layer);
1909  }
1910  }
1911 
1912  g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_LAYERS_CHANGED], 0);
1913  ev_view_reload_page (view, view->current_page, NULL);
1914  }
1915  break;

1917  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_EXTERNAL_URI:
1918  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_LAUNCH:
1919  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_NAMED:
1920  g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_EXTERNAL_LINK], 0, action);

1922  }

4926  EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget);

4928  gint x, y;
4929

4931  return FALSE;
4932

4934 
4935  if (event->is_hint || event->window != window) {
4936  ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (widget, &x, &y);
4937  } else {
4938  x = event->x;
4939  y = event->y;
4940  }
4941 
4942  if (view->scroll_info.autoscrolling) {
4943  view->scroll_info.last_y = y;
4944  return TRUE;
4945  }
4946 
4947  if (view->selection_info.in_drag) {
4948  if (gtk_drag_check_threshold (widget,
4949  view->selection_info.start.x,

4955

4957  GDK_ACTION_COPY,
4958  1, (GdkEvent *)event);
4959 
4960  view->selection_info.in_drag = FALSE;
4961 
4962  gtk_target_list_unref (target_list);
4963 
4964  return TRUE;
4965  }
4966  } else if (view->image_dnd_info.in_drag) {
4967  if (gtk_drag_check_threshold (widget,
4968  view->selection_info.start.x,
4969  view->selection_info.start.y,
4970  x, y)) {
4971  GtkTargetList *target_list = gtk_target_list_new (NULL, 0);
4972 
4973  gtk_target_list_add_uri_targets (target_list, TARGET_DND_URI);
4974  gtk_target_list_add_image_targets (target_list, TARGET_DND_IMAGE, TRUE);
4975 
4976  gtk_drag_begin (widget, target_list,
4977  GDK_ACTION_COPY,
4978  1, (GdkEvent *)event);
4979 
4980  view->image_dnd_info.in_drag = FALSE;
4981 
4982  gtk_target_list_unref (target_list);
4983 
4984  return TRUE;
4985  }
4986  }
4987 
4988  switch (view->pressed_button) {
4989  case 1:
4990  /* For the Evince 0.4.x release, we limit selection to un-rotated
4991  * documents only.
4992  */
4993  if (view->rotation != 0)
4994  return FALSE;
4995 
4996  /* Schedule timeout to scroll during selection and additionally
4997  * scroll once to allow arbitrary speed. */
4998  if (!view->selection_scroll_id)
4999  view->selection_scroll_id = g_timeout_add (SCROLL_TIME,
5000  (GSourceFunc)selection_scroll_timeout_cb,
5001  view);
5002  else
5003  selection_scroll_timeout_cb (view);
5004 
5005  view->motion.x = x + view->scroll_x;
5006  view->motion.y = y + view->scroll_y;
5007 
5008  /* Queue an idle to handle the motion. We do this because
5009  * handling any selection events in the motion could be slower
5010  * than new motion events reach us. We always put it in the
5011  * idle to make sure we catch up and don't visibly lag the
5012  * mouse. */
5013  if (!view->selection_update_id)
5014  view->selection_update_id = g_idle_add ((GSourceFunc)selection_update_idle_cb, view);
5015 
5016  return TRUE;
5017  case 2:
5018  if (!view->drag_info.in_drag) {
5019  gboolean start;
5020  int i;
5021 
5022  start = gtk_drag_check_threshold (widget,
5023  view->drag_info.start.x,
5024  view->drag_info.start.y,
5025  event->x_root,
5026  event->y_root);
5027  view->drag_info.in_drag = start;
5028  view->drag_info.drag_timeout_id = g_timeout_add (10,
5029  (GSourceFunc)ev_view_drag_update_momentum, view);
5030  /* Set 100 to choose how long it takes to build up momentum */
5031  /* Clear out previous momentum info: */
5032  for (i = 0; i < DRAG_HISTORY; i++) {
5033  view->drag_info.buffer[i].x = event->x;
5034  view->drag_info.buffer[i].y = event->y;
5035  }
5036  view->drag_info.momentum.x = 0;
5037  view->drag_info.momentum.y = 0;
5038  }
5039 
5040  if (view->drag_info.in_drag) {
5041  int dx, dy;
5042  gdouble dhadj_value, dvadj_value;
5043  GtkAllocation allocation;
5044 
5045  view->drag_info.buffer[0].x = event->x;
5046  view->drag_info.buffer[0].y = event->y;
5047 
5048  dx = event->x_root - view->drag_info.start.x;
5049  dy = event->y_root - view->drag_info.start.y;
5050 
5051  gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
5052 
5053  dhadj_value = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment) *
5054  (gdouble)dx / allocation.width;
5055  dvadj_value = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment) *
5056  (gdouble)dy / allocation.height;
5057 
5058  /* clamp scrolling to visible area */
5059  gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->hadjustment,
5060  MIN (view->drag_info.hadj - dhadj_value,
5061  gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->hadjustment) -
5062  gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment)));
5063  gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->vadjustment,
5064  MIN (view->drag_info.vadj - dvadj_value,
5065  gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) -
5066  gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment)));
5067 
5068  return TRUE;
5069  }
5070 
5071  break;
5072  default:
5073  ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, x, y);
5074  }
5075 
5076  return FALSE;
5077 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static gboolean ev_view_move_cursor ( EvView *  view,
GtkMovementStep  step,
gint  count,
gboolean  extend_selection 
)
static

Definition at line 5544 of file ev-view.c.

5548 {
5549  GdkRectangle rect;
5550  GdkRectangle prev_rect;
5551  gint prev_offset;
5552  gint prev_page;
5553  cairo_region_t *damage_region;
5554  gboolean clear_selections = FALSE;
5555 
5556  if (!view->caret_enabled || view->rotation != 0)
5557  return FALSE;
5558 
5559  view->key_binding_handled = TRUE;
5560  view->cursor_blink_time = 0;
5561 
5562  prev_offset = view->cursor_offset;
5563  prev_page = view->cursor_page;
5564 
5565  clear_selections = !extend_selection && view->selection_info.selections != NULL;
5566 
5567  switch (step) {
5568  case GTK_MOVEMENT_VISUAL_POSITIONS:
5569  if (!clear_selections || !cursor_clear_selection (view, count > 0)) {
5570  while (count > 0) {
5571  cursor_forward_char (view);
5572  count--;
5573  }
5574  while (count < 0) {
5575  cursor_backward_char (view);
5576  count++;
5577  }
5578  }
5579  break;
5580  case GTK_MOVEMENT_WORDS:
5581  while (count > 0) {
5582  cursor_forward_word_end (view);
5583  count--;
5584  }
5585  while (count < 0) {
5586  cursor_backward_word_start (view);
5587  count++;
5588  }
5589  break;
5590  case GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINES:
5591  while (count > 0) {
5592  cursor_forward_line (view);
5593  count--;
5594  }
5595  while (count < 0) {
5596  cursor_backward_line (view);
5597  count++;
5598  }
5599  break;
5600  case GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINE_ENDS:
5601  if (count > 0)
5602  cursor_go_to_line_end (view);
5603  else if (count < 0)
5604  cursor_go_to_line_start (view);
5605  break;
5606  default:
5607  g_assert_not_reached ();
5608  }
5609 
5610  ev_view_pend_cursor_blink (view);
5611 
5612  /* Notify the user that it was not possible to move the caret cursor */
5613  if (!clear_selections &&
5614  prev_offset == view->cursor_offset && prev_page == view->cursor_page) {
5615  gtk_widget_error_bell (GTK_WIDGET (view));
5616  return TRUE;
5617  }
5618 
5619  /* Scroll to make the caret visible */
5620  if (!get_caret_cursor_area (view, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset, &rect))
5621  return TRUE;
5622 
5623  if (step == GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINES) {
5624  position_caret_cursor_at_location (view,
5625  MAX (rect.x, view->cursor_line_offset),
5626  rect.y + (rect.height / 2));
5627  if (!clear_selections &&
5628  prev_offset == view->cursor_offset && prev_page == view->cursor_page) {
5629  gtk_widget_error_bell (GTK_WIDGET (view));
5630  return TRUE;
5631  }
5632 
5633  if (!get_caret_cursor_area (view, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset, &rect))
5634  return TRUE;
5635  } else {
5636  view->cursor_line_offset = rect.x;
5637  }
5638 
5639  damage_region = cairo_region_create_rectangle (&rect);
5640  if (get_caret_cursor_area (view, prev_page, prev_offset, &prev_rect))
5641  cairo_region_union_rectangle (damage_region, &prev_rect);
5642 
5643  rect.x += view->scroll_x;
5644  rect.y += view->scroll_y;
5645 
5646  ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, view->cursor_page);
5647  ensure_rectangle_is_visible (view, &rect);
5648 
5649  g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_CURSOR_MOVED], 0, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset);
5650 
5651  gdk_window_invalidate_region (gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)),
5652  damage_region, TRUE);
5653  cairo_region_destroy (damage_region);
5654 
5655  /* Select text */
5656  if (extend_selection && EV_IS_SELECTION (view->document)) {
5657  GdkPoint start_point, end_point;
5658 
5659  start_point.x = prev_rect.x + view->scroll_x;
5660  start_point.y = prev_rect.y + (prev_rect.height / 2) + view->scroll_y;
5661 
5662  end_point.x = rect.x;
5663  end_point.y = rect.y + rect.height / 2;
5664 
5665  extend_selection_from_cursor (view, &start_point, &end_point);
5666  } else if (clear_selections)
5667  clear_selection (view);
5668 
5669  return TRUE;
5670 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void ev_view_scroll ( EvView *  view,
GtkScrollType  scroll,
gboolean  horizontal 
)

ev_view_scroll: : a EvView : :

Deprecated: 3.10

Definition at line 928 of file ev-view.c.

931 {
932  GtkAdjustment *adjustment;
933  double value, increment;
934  gdouble upper, lower;
935  gdouble page_size;
936  gdouble step_increment;
937  gboolean first_page = FALSE;
938  gboolean last_page = FALSE;
939 
940  if (view->key_binding_handled)
941  return;
942 
943  view->jump_to_find_result = FALSE;
944 
945  if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE) {
946  switch (scroll) {
947  case GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD:
948  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_BACKWARD:
949  ev_view_previous_page (view);
950  break;
951  case GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_FORWARD:
952  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_FORWARD:
953  ev_view_next_page (view);
954  break;
955  default:
956  break;
957  }
958  return;
959  }
960 
961  /* Assign values for increment and vertical adjustment */
962  adjustment = horizontal ? view->hadjustment : view->vadjustment;
963  value = gtk_adjustment_get_value (adjustment);
964  upper = gtk_adjustment_get_upper (adjustment);
965  lower = gtk_adjustment_get_lower (adjustment);
966  page_size = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment);
967  step_increment = gtk_adjustment_get_step_increment (adjustment);
968 
969  /* Assign boolean for first and last page */
970  if (view->current_page == 0)
971  first_page = TRUE;
972  if (view->current_page == ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document) - 1)
973  last_page = TRUE;
974 
975  switch (scroll) {
976  case GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD:
977  /* Do not jump backwards if at the first page */
978  if (value == lower && first_page) {
979  /* Do nothing */
980  /* At the top of a page, assign the upper bound limit of previous page */
981  } else if (value == lower) {
982  value = upper - page_size;
983  ev_view_previous_page (view);
984  /* Jump to the top */
985  } else {
986  increment = compute_scroll_increment (view, GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD);
987  value = MAX (value - increment, lower);
988  }
989  break;
990  case GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_FORWARD:
991  /* Do not jump forward if at the last page */
992  if (value == (upper - page_size) && last_page) {
993  /* Do nothing */
994  /* At the bottom of a page, assign the lower bound limit of next page */
995  } else if (value == (upper - page_size)) {
996  value = 0;
997  ev_view_next_page (view);
998  /* Jump to the bottom */
999  } else {
1000  increment = compute_scroll_increment (view, GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_FORWARD);
1001  value = MIN (value + increment, upper - page_size);
1002  }
1003  break;
1004  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_BACKWARD:
1005  value -= step_increment;
1006  break;
1007  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_FORWARD:
1008  value += step_increment;
1009  break;
1010  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_DOWN:
1011  value -= step_increment / 10;
1012  break;
1013  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_UP:
1014  value += step_increment / 10;
1015  break;
1016  default:
1017  break;
1018  }
1019 
1020  value = CLAMP (value, lower, upper - page_size);
1021 
1022  gtk_adjustment_set_value (adjustment, value);
1023 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static gboolean ev_view_scroll_drag_release ( EvView *  view)
static

Definition at line 4872 of file ev-view.c.

4873 {
4874  gdouble dhadj_value, dvadj_value;
4875  gdouble oldhadjustment, oldvadjustment;
4876  gdouble h_page_size, v_page_size;
4877  gdouble h_upper, v_upper;
4878  GtkAllocation allocation;
4879 
4880  view->drag_info.momentum.x /= 1.2;
4881  view->drag_info.momentum.y /= 1.2; /* Alter these constants to change "friction" */
4882 
4883  gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (view), &allocation);
4884 
4885  h_page_size = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment);
4886  v_page_size = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment);
4887 
4888  dhadj_value = h_page_size *
4889  (gdouble)view->drag_info.momentum.x / allocation.width;
4890  dvadj_value = v_page_size *
4891  (gdouble)view->drag_info.momentum.y / allocation.height;
4892 
4893  oldhadjustment = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment);
4894  oldvadjustment = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
4895 
4896  h_upper = gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->hadjustment);
4897  v_upper = gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment);
4898 
4899  /* When we reach the edges, we need either to absorb some momentum and bounce by
4900  * multiplying it on -0.5 or stop scrolling by setting momentum to 0. */
4901  if (((oldhadjustment + dhadj_value) > (h_upper - h_page_size)) ||
4902  ((oldhadjustment + dhadj_value) < 0))
4903  view->drag_info.momentum.x = 0;
4904  if (((oldvadjustment + dvadj_value) > (v_upper - v_page_size)) ||
4905  ((oldvadjustment + dvadj_value) < 0))
4906  view->drag_info.momentum.y = 0;
4907 
4908  gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->hadjustment,
4909  MIN (oldhadjustment + dhadj_value,
4910  h_upper - h_page_size));
4911  gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->vadjustment,
4912  MIN (oldvadjustment + dvadj_value,
4913  v_upper - v_page_size));
4914 
4915  if (((view->drag_info.momentum.x < 1) && (view->drag_info.momentum.x > -1)) &&
4916  ((view->drag_info.momentum.y < 1) && (view->drag_info.momentum.y > -1)))
4917  return FALSE;
4918  else
4919  return TRUE;
4920 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static gboolean ev_view_scroll_event ( GtkWidget *  widget,
GdkEventScroll *  event 
)
static

Definition at line 3810 of file ev-view.c.

3811 {
3812  EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget);
3813  guint state;
3814 
3815  state = event->state & gtk_accelerator_get_default_mod_mask ();
3816 
3817  if (state == GDK_CONTROL_MASK) {
3818  ev_document_model_set_sizing_mode (view->model, EV_SIZING_FREE);
3819  switch (event->direction) {
3820  case GDK_SCROLL_DOWN:
3821  case GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT:
3822  if (ev_view_can_zoom_out (view))
3823  ev_view_zoom_out (view);
3824  break;
3825  case GDK_SCROLL_UP:
3826  case GDK_SCROLL_LEFT:
3827  if (ev_view_can_zoom_in (view))
3828  ev_view_zoom_in (view);
3829  break;
3830  case GDK_SCROLL_SMOOTH: {
3831  gdouble delta = event->delta_x + event->delta_y;
3832  gdouble factor = pow (delta < 0 ? ZOOM_IN_FACTOR : ZOOM_OUT_FACTOR, fabs (delta));
3833 
3834  if ((factor < 1.0 && ev_view_can_zoom_out (view)) ||
3835  (factor >= 1.0 && ev_view_can_zoom_in (view)))
3836  ev_view_zoom (view, factor);
3837  }
3838  break;
3839  }
3840 
3841  return TRUE;
3842  }
3843 
3844  view->jump_to_find_result = FALSE;
3845 
3846  /* Shift+Wheel scrolls the in the perpendicular direction */
3847  if (state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) {
3848  if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_UP)
3849  event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_LEFT;
3850  else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_LEFT)
3851  event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_UP;
3852  else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_DOWN)
3853  event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT;
3854  else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT)
3855  event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_DOWN;
3856  else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_SMOOTH) {
3857  /* Swap the deltas for perpendicular direction */
3858  gdouble tmp_delta = event->delta_x;
3859 
3860  event->delta_x = event->delta_y;
3861  event->delta_y = tmp_delta;
3862  }
3863 
3864  event->state &= ~GDK_SHIFT_MASK;
3865  state &= ~GDK_SHIFT_MASK;
3866  }
3867 
3868  if (state == 0 && view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE && !view->continuous) {
3869  switch (event->direction) {
3870  case GDK_SCROLL_DOWN:
3871  case GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT:
3872  ev_view_next_page (view);
3873  break;
3874  case GDK_SCROLL_UP:
3875  case GDK_SCROLL_LEFT:
3876  ev_view_previous_page (view);
3877  break;
3878  case GDK_SCROLL_SMOOTH: {
3879  gdouble decrement;
3880 
3881  /* Emulate normal scrolling by summing the deltas */
3882  view->total_delta += event->delta_x + event->delta_y;
3883 
3884  decrement = view->total_delta < 0 ? -1.0 : 1.0;
3885  for (; fabs (view->total_delta) >= 1.0; view->total_delta -= decrement) {
3886  if (decrement < 0)
3887  ev_view_previous_page (view);
3888  else
3889  ev_view_next_page (view);
3890  }
3891  }
3892  break;
3893  }
3894 
3895  return TRUE;
3896  }
3897 
3898  return FALSE;
3899 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static void ev_view_set_adjustment_values ( EvView *  view,
GtkOrientation  orientation 
)
static

Definition at line 594 of file ev-view.c.

596 {
597  GtkWidget *widget = GTK_WIDGET (view);
598  GtkAdjustment *adjustment;
599  GtkAllocation allocation;
600  int req_size;
601  int alloc_size;
602  gdouble page_size;
603  gdouble value;
604  gdouble upper;
605  double factor;
606  gint new_value;
607 
608  gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
609 
610  if (orientation == GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL) {
611  req_size = view->requisition.width;
612  alloc_size = allocation.width;
613  adjustment = view->hadjustment;
614  } else {
615  req_size = view->requisition.height;
616  alloc_size = allocation.height;
617  adjustment = view->vadjustment;
618  }
619 
620  if (!adjustment)
621  return;
622 
623  factor = 1.0;
624  value = gtk_adjustment_get_value (adjustment);
625  upper = gtk_adjustment_get_upper (adjustment);
626  page_size = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment);
627 
628  if (upper != .0) {
629  switch (view->pending_scroll) {
630  case SCROLL_TO_KEEP_POSITION:
631  case SCROLL_TO_FIND_LOCATION:
632  factor = value / upper;
633  break;
634  case SCROLL_TO_PAGE_POSITION:
635  break;
636  case SCROLL_TO_CENTER:
637  factor = (value + page_size * 0.5) / upper;
638  break;
639  }
640  }
641 
642  upper = MAX (alloc_size, req_size);
643  page_size = alloc_size;
644 
645  gtk_adjustment_set_page_size (adjustment, page_size);
646  gtk_adjustment_set_step_increment (adjustment, alloc_size * 0.1);
647  gtk_adjustment_set_page_increment (adjustment, alloc_size * 0.9);
648  gtk_adjustment_set_lower (adjustment, 0);
649  gtk_adjustment_set_upper (adjustment, upper);
650 
651  /*
652  * We add 0.5 to the values before to average out our rounding errors.
653  */
654  switch (view->pending_scroll) {
655  case SCROLL_TO_KEEP_POSITION:
656  case SCROLL_TO_FIND_LOCATION:
657  new_value = CLAMP (upper * factor + 0.5, 0, upper - page_size);
658  gtk_adjustment_set_value (adjustment, (int)new_value);
659  break;
660  case SCROLL_TO_PAGE_POSITION:
661  ev_view_scroll_to_page_position (view, orientation);
662  break;
663  case SCROLL_TO_CENTER:
664  new_value = CLAMP (upper * factor - page_size * 0.5 + 0.5,
665  0, upper - page_size);
666  gtk_adjustment_set_value (adjustment, (int)new_value);
667  break;
668  }
669 
670  gtk_adjustment_changed (adjustment);
671 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void ev_view_set_page_cache_size ( EvView *  view,
gsize  cache_size 
)

ev_view_set_page_cache_size: : EvView instance : size in bytes

Sets the maximum size in bytes that will be used to cache rendered pages. Use 0 to disable caching rendered pages.

Note that this limit doesn't affect the current visible page range, which will always be rendered. In order to limit the total memory used you have to use ev_document_model_set_max_scale() too.

Definition at line 6742 of file ev-view.c.

6749  if (view->pixbuf_cache)
6750  ev_pixbuf_cache_set_max_size (view->pixbuf_cache, cache_size);
6751 
6752  view_update_scale_limits (view);
6753 }

Definition at line 3598 of file ev-view.c.

3603 
3604  if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE) {
3605  requisition->width = 1;
3606  requisition->height = 1;
3607

3609  }

3612  ev_view_get_page_size (view,
3613  view->current_page,
3614  &width, &height);
3615  if (view->current_page + 1 < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document)) {
3616  gint width_2, height_2;
3617  ev_view_get_page_size (view,
3618  view->current_page + 1,
3619  &width_2, &height_2);
3620  if (width_2 > width) {
3621  width = width_2;
3622  height = height_2;
3623  }
3624  }
3625  compute_border (view, &border);
3626 
3627  requisition->width = view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH ? 1 :
3628  ((width + border.left + border.right) * 2) + (view->spacing * 3);
3629  requisition->height = (height + border.top + border.bottom) + (view->spacing * 2);
3630 }

static void ev_view_zoom_for_size_dual_page ( EvView *  view,
int  width,
int  height 
)
static

Definition at line 7337 of file ev-view.c.

7340 {
7341  GtkBorder border;
7342  gdouble doc_width, doc_height;
7343  gdouble scale;
7344  gint other_page;
7345  gint sb_size;
7346 
7347  other_page = view->current_page ^ 1;
7348 
7349  /* Find the largest of the two. */
7350  get_doc_page_size (view, view->current_page, &doc_width, &doc_height);
7351  if (other_page < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document)) {
7352  gdouble width_2, height_2;
7353 
7354  get_doc_page_size (view, other_page, &width_2, &height_2);
7355  if (width_2 > doc_width)
7356  doc_width = width_2;
7357  if (height_2 > doc_height)
7358  doc_height = height_2;
7359  }
7360  compute_border (view, &border);
7361 
7362  doc_width = doc_width * 2;
7363  width -= ((border.left + border.right)* 2 + 3 * view->spacing);
7364  height -= (border.top + border.bottom + 2 * view->spacing);
7365 
7366  switch (view->sizing_mode) {
7367  case EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH:
7368  sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
7369  scale = zoom_for_size_fit_width (doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7370  break;
7371  case EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE:
7372  scale = zoom_for_size_fit_page (doc_width, doc_height, width, height);
7373  break;
7374  case EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC:
7375  sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
7376  scale = zoom_for_size_automatic (gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view)),
7377  doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7378  break;
7379  default:
7380  g_assert_not_reached ();
7381  }
7382 
7383  ev_document_model_set_scale (view->model, scale);
7384 }

static void find_page_at_location ( EvView *  view,
gdouble  x,
gdouble  y,
gint *  page,
gint *  x_offset,
gint *  y_offset 
)
static

Definition at line 1419 of file ev-view.c.

1425 {
1426  int i;
1427 
1428  if (view->document == NULL)
1429  return;
1430 
1431  g_assert (page);
1432  g_assert (x_offset);
1433  g_assert (y_offset);
1434 
1435  for (i = view->start_page; i >= 0 && i <= view->end_page; i++) {
1436  GdkRectangle page_area;
1437  GtkBorder border;
1438 
1439  if (! ev_view_get_page_extents (view, i, &page_area, &border))
1440  continue;
1441 
1442  if ((x >= page_area.x + border.left) &&
1443  (x < page_area.x + page_area.width - border.right) &&
1444  (y >= page_area.y + border.top) &&
1445  (y < page_area.y + page_area.height - border.bottom)) {
1446  *page = i;
1447  *x_offset = x - (page_area.x + border.left);
1448  *y_offset = y - (page_area.y + border.top);
1449  return;
1450  }
1451  }
1452 
1453  *page = -1;
1454 }

ev_view  ,

G_IMPLEMENT_INTERFACE(GTK_TYPE_SCROLLABLE, NULL)

Definition at line 286 of file ev-view.c.

295 {
296  gboolean swap, uniform;
297  int i;
298  double uniform_height, page_height, next_page_height;
299  double saved_height;
300  gdouble u_width, u_height;
301  gint n_pages;
302  EvDocument *document = view->document;
303 
304  swap = (view->rotation == 90 || view->rotation == 270);
305 
306  uniform = ev_document_is_page_size_uniform (document);
307  n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (document);
308 
309  g_free (cache->height_to_page);
310  g_free (cache->dual_height_to_page);
311 
312  cache->rotation = view->rotation;
313  cache->dual_even_left = view->dual_even_left;
314  cache->height_to_page = g_new0 (gdouble, n_pages + 1);
315  cache->dual_height_to_page = g_new0 (gdouble, n_pages + 2);
316 
317  if (uniform)
318  ev_document_get_page_size (document, 0, &u_width, &u_height);
319 
320  saved_height = 0;
321  for (i = 0; i <= n_pages; i++) {
322  if (uniform) {
323  uniform_height = swap ? u_width : u_height;
324  cache->height_to_page[i] = i * uniform_height;
325  } else {
326  if (i < n_pages) {
327  gdouble w, h;
328 
329  ev_document_get_page_size (document, i, &w, &h);
330  page_height = swap ? w : h;
331  } else {
332  page_height = 0;
333  }
334  cache->height_to_page[i] = saved_height;
335  saved_height += page_height;
336  }
337  }
338 
339  if (cache->dual_even_left && !uniform) {
340  gdouble w, h;
341 
342  ev_document_get_page_size (document, 0, &w, &h);
343  saved_height = swap ? w : h;
344  } else {
345  saved_height = 0;
346  }
347 
348  for (i = cache->dual_even_left; i < n_pages + 2; i += 2) {
349  if (uniform) {
350  uniform_height = swap ? u_width : u_height;
351  cache->dual_height_to_page[i] = ((i + cache->dual_even_left) / 2) * uniform_height;
352  if (i + 1 < n_pages + 2)
353  cache->dual_height_to_page[i + 1] = ((i + cache->dual_even_left) / 2) * uniform_height;
354  } else {
355  if (i + 1 < n_pages) {
356  gdouble w, h;
357 
358  ev_document_get_page_size (document, i + 1, &w, &h);
359  next_page_height = swap ? w : h;
360  } else {
361  next_page_height = 0;
362  }
363 
364  if (i < n_pages) {
365  gdouble w, h;
366 
367  ev_document_get_page_size (document, i, &w, &h);
368  page_height = swap ? w : h;
369  } else {
370  page_height = 0;
371  }
372 
373  if (i + 1 < n_pages + 2) {
374  cache->dual_height_to_page[i] = saved_height;
375  cache->dual_height_to_page[i + 1] = saved_height;
376  saved_height += MAX(page_height, next_page_height);
377  } else {
378  cache->dual_height_to_page[i] = saved_height;
379  }
380  }
381  }
382 }

3288 {
3289  EvRectangle *areas = NULL;
3290  EvRectangle *doc_rect;
3291  guint n_areas = 0;
3292  gfloat cursor_aspect_ratio;
3293  gint stem_width;
3294 
3295  if (!view->caret_enabled || view->rotation != 0)
3296  return FALSE;
3297 
3298  if (!view->page_cache)
3299  return FALSE;
3300 
3301  ev_page_cache_get_text_layout (view->page_cache, page, &areas, &n_areas);
3302  if (!areas)
3303  return FALSE;
3304 
3305  if (offset > n_areas)
3306  return FALSE;
3307 
3308  doc_rect = areas + offset;
3309  if (offset == n_areas ||
3310  ((doc_rect->x1 == doc_rect->x2 || doc_rect->y1 == doc_rect->y2) && offset > 0)) {
3311  EvRectangle *prev;
3312  EvRectangle last_rect;
3313 
3314  /* Special characters like \n have an empty bounding box
3315  * and the end of a page doesn't have any bounding box,
3316  * use the size of the previous area.
3317  */
3318  prev = areas + offset - 1;
3319  last_rect.x1 = prev->x2;
3320  last_rect.y1 = prev->y1;
3321  last_rect.x2 = prev->x2 + (prev->x2 - prev->x1);
3322  last_rect.y2 = prev->y2;
3323 
3324  _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, page, &last_rect, area);
3325  } else {
3326  _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, page, doc_rect, area);
3327  }
3328 
3329  area->x -= view->scroll_x;
3330  area->y -= view->scroll_y;
3331 
3332  gtk_style_context_get_style (gtk_widget_get_style_context (GTK_WIDGET (view)),
3333  "cursor-aspect-ratio", &cursor_aspect_ratio,
3334  NULL);
3335  stem_width = area->height * cursor_aspect_ratio + 1;
3336  area->x -= (stem_width / 2);
3337  area->width = stem_width;
3338 
3339  return TRUE;
3340 }

1514  y_offset = y_offset / view->scale;
1515

1517  x = x_offset;
1518  y = y_offset;

static gboolean get_selection_page_range ( EvView *  view,

)

Definition at line 7697 of file ev-view.c.

7703 {
7704  gint start_page, end_page;
7705  gint first, last;
7706  gint i, n_pages;
7707 
7708  n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document);
7709 
7710  if (gdk_point_equal (start, stop)) {
7711  start_page = view->start_page;
7712  end_page = view->end_page;
7713  } else if (view->continuous) {
7714  start_page = 0;
7715  end_page = n_pages - 1;
7716  } else if (is_dual_page (view, NULL)) {
7717  start_page = view->start_page;
7718  end_page = view->end_page;
7719  } else {
7720  start_page = view->current_page;
7721  end_page = view->current_page;
7722  }
7723 
7724  first = -1;
7725  last = -1;
7726  for (i = start_page; i <= end_page; i++) {
7727  GdkRectangle page_area;
7728  GtkBorder border;
7729 
7730  ev_view_get_page_extents (view, i, &page_area, &border);
7731  page_area.x -= border.left;
7732  page_area.y -= border.top;
7733  page_area.width += border.left + border.right;
7734  page_area.height += border.top + border.bottom;
7735  if (gdk_rectangle_point_in (&page_area, start) ||
7736  gdk_rectangle_point_in (&page_area, stop)) {
7737  if (first == -1)
7738  first = i;
7739  last = i;
7740  }
7741  }
7742 
7743  if (first != -1 && last != -1) {
7744  *first_page = first;
7745  *last_page = last;
7746 
7747  return TRUE;
7748  }
7749 
7750  return FALSE;
7751 }

1798  n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document);
1799

1801  return;

1813  break;

1829  default:

1831  }
1832

static gboolean is_dual_page ( EvView *  view,
gboolean *  odd_left_out 
)
static

Definition at line 482 of file ev-view.c.

484 {
485  gboolean dual = FALSE;
486  gboolean odd_left = FALSE;
487 
488  switch (view->page_layout) {
489  case EV_PAGE_LAYOUT_AUTOMATIC: {
490  GdkScreen *screen;
491  double scale;
492  double doc_width;
493  double doc_height;
494  GtkAllocation allocation;
495 
496  screen = gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view));
497  scale = ev_document_misc_get_screen_dpi (screen) / 72.0;
498 
499  ev_document_get_max_page_size (view->document, &doc_width, &doc_height);
500  gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (view), &allocation);
501 
502  /* If the width is ok and the height is pretty close, try to fit it in */
503  if (ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document) > 1 &&
504  doc_width < doc_height &&
505  allocation.width > (2 * doc_width * scale) &&
506  allocation.height > (doc_height * scale * 0.9)) {
507  odd_left = !view->dual_even_left;
508  dual = TRUE;
509  }
510  }
511  break;
512  case EV_PAGE_LAYOUT_DUAL:
513  odd_left = !view->dual_even_left;
514  dual = TRUE;
515  break;
516  case EV_PAGE_LAYOUT_SINGLE:
517  break;
518  default:
519  g_assert_not_reached ();
520  }
521 
522  if (odd_left_out)
523  *odd_left_out = odd_left;
524 
525  return dual;
526 }

static void jump_to_find_page ( EvView *  view,
EvViewFindDirection  direction,
gint  shift 
)
static

jump_to_find_page: : EvView instance : Direction to look : Shift from current page

Jumps to the first page that has occurences of searched word. Uses a direction where to look and a shift from current page.

Definition at line 7495 of file ev-view.c.

7496 {
7497  int n_pages, i;
7498

7500 
7501  for (i = 0; i < n_pages; i++) {
7502  int page;
7503 
7504  if (direction == EV_VIEW_FIND_NEXT)
7505  page = view->current_page + i;
7506  else
7507  page = view->current_page - i;
7508  page += shift;
7509 
7510  if (page >= n_pages) {
7511  page = page - n_pages;
7512  } else if (page < 0)
7513  page = page + n_pages;
7514 
7515  if (ev_view_find_get_n_results (view, page) > 0) {
7516  ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, page);
7517  break;

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static void merge_selection_region ( EvView *  view,
GList *  new_list 
)
static

Definition at line 7828 of file ev-view.c.

7830 {
7831  GList *old_list;
7832  GList *new_list_ptr, *old_list_ptr;
7833 
7834  /* Update the selection */
7835  old_list = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_list (view->pixbuf_cache);
7836  g_list_free_full (view->selection_info.selections, (GDestroyNotify)selection_free);
7837  view->selection_info.selections = new_list;
7838  ev_pixbuf_cache_set_selection_list (view->pixbuf_cache, new_list);
7839  g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_SELECTION_CHANGED], 0, NULL);
7840 
7841  new_list_ptr = new_list;
7842  old_list_ptr = old_list;
7843 
7844  while (new_list_ptr || old_list_ptr) {
7845  EvViewSelection *old_sel, *new_sel;
7846  int cur_page;
7847  cairo_region_t *region = NULL;
7848 
7849  new_sel = (new_list_ptr) ? (new_list_ptr->data) : NULL;
7850  old_sel = (old_list_ptr) ? (old_list_ptr->data) : NULL;
7851 
7852  /* Assume that the lists are in order, and we run through them
7853  * comparing them, one page at a time. We come out with the
7854  * first page we see. */
7855  if (new_sel && old_sel) {
7856  if (new_sel->page < old_sel->page) {
7857  new_list_ptr = new_list_ptr->next;
7858  old_sel = NULL;
7859  } else if (new_sel->page > old_sel->page) {
7860  old_list_ptr = old_list_ptr->next;
7861  new_sel = NULL;
7862  } else {
7863  new_list_ptr = new_list_ptr->next;
7864  old_list_ptr = old_list_ptr->next;
7865  }
7866  } else if (new_sel) {
7867  new_list_ptr = new_list_ptr->next;
7868  } else if (old_sel) {
7869  old_list_ptr = old_list_ptr->next;
7870  }
7871 
7872  g_assert (new_sel || old_sel);
7873 
7874  /* is the page we're looking at on the screen?*/
7875  cur_page = new_sel ? new_sel->page : old_sel->page;
7876  if (cur_page < view->start_page || cur_page > view->end_page)
7877  continue;
7878 
7879  /* seed the cache with a new page. We are going to need the new
7880  * region too. */
7881  if (new_sel) {
7882  cairo_region_t *tmp_region;
7883 
7884  tmp_region = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_region (view->pixbuf_cache,
7885  cur_page,
7886  view->scale);
7887  if (tmp_region)
7888  new_sel->covered_region = cairo_region_reference (tmp_region);
7889  }
7890 
7891  /* Now we figure out what needs redrawing */
7892  if (old_sel && new_sel) {
7893  if (old_sel->covered_region && new_sel->covered_region) {
7894  if (!cairo_region_equal (old_sel->covered_region, new_sel->covered_region)) {
7895  /* Anything that was previously or currently selected may
7896  * have changed */
7897  region = cairo_region_copy (old_sel->covered_region);
7898  cairo_region_union (region, new_sel->covered_region);
7899  }
7900  } else if (old_sel->covered_region) {
7901  region = cairo_region_reference (old_sel->covered_region);
7902  } else if (new_sel->covered_region) {
7903  region = cairo_region_reference (new_sel->covered_region);
7904  }
7905  } else if (old_sel && !new_sel) {
7906  if (old_sel->covered_region && !cairo_region_is_empty (old_sel->covered_region)) {
7907  region = cairo_region_reference (old_sel->covered_region);
7908  }
7909  } else if (!old_sel && new_sel) {
7910  if (new_sel->covered_region && !cairo_region_is_empty (new_sel->covered_region)) {
7911  region = cairo_region_reference (new_sel->covered_region);
7912  }
7913  } else {
7914  g_assert_not_reached ();
7915  }
7916 
7917  /* Redraw the damaged region! */
7918  if (region) {
7919  GdkRectangle page_area;
7920  GtkBorder border;
7921  cairo_region_t *damage_region;
7922  gint i, n_rects;
7923 
7924  ev_view_get_page_extents (view, cur_page, &page_area, &border);
7925 
7926  damage_region = cairo_region_create ();
7927  /* Translate the region and grow it 2 pixels because for some zoom levels
7928  * the area actually drawn by cairo is larger than the selected region, due
7929  * to rounding errors or pixel alignment.
7930  */
7931  n_rects = cairo_region_num_rectangles (region);
7932  for (i = 0; i < n_rects; i++) {
7933  cairo_rectangle_int_t rect;
7934 
7935  cairo_region_get_rectangle (region, i, &rect);
7936  rect.x += page_area.x + border.left - view->scroll_x - 2;
7937  rect.y += page_area.y + border.top - view->scroll_y - 2;
7938  rect.width += 4;
7939  rect.height += 4;
7940  cairo_region_union_rectangle (damage_region, &rect);
7941  }
7942  cairo_region_destroy (region);
7943 
7944  gdk_window_invalidate_region (gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)),
7945  damage_region, TRUE);
7946  cairo_region_destroy (damage_region);
7947  }
7948  }
7949 
7950  ev_view_check_cursor_blink (view);
7951 
7952  /* Free the old list, now that we're done with it. */
7953  g_list_free_full (old_list, (GDestroyNotify)selection_free);
7954 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

)

6631  gint value;
6632  GList *l;

6634  if (!gtk_widget_get_realized (widget))
6635  return;
6636 
6637  if (view->hadjustment) {
6638  value = (gint) gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment);
6639  dx = view->scroll_x - value;
6640  view->scroll_x = value;
6641  } else {
6642  view->scroll_x = 0;
6643  }
6644 
6645  if (view->vadjustment) {
6646  value = (gint) gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
6647  dy = view->scroll_y - value;
6648  view->scroll_y = value;
6649  } else {
6650  view->scroll_y = 0;
6651  }

6654  EvViewChild *child = (EvViewChild *)l->data;
6655 
6656  child->x += dx;
6657  child->y += dy;
6658  if (gtk_widget_get_visible (child->widget) && gtk_widget_get_visible (widget))
6659  gtk_widget_queue_resize (widget);
6660  }
6661 
6662  for (l = view->window_children; l && l->data; l = g_list_next (l)) {
6663  EvViewWindowChild *child;
6664 
6665  child = (EvViewWindowChild *)l->data;
6666 
6667  ev_view_window_child_move (view, child, child->x + dx, child->y + dy);
6668  }
6669 
6670  if (view->pending_resize) {
6671  gtk_widget_queue_draw (widget);
6672  } else {
6673  gdk_window_scroll (gtk_widget_get_window (widget), dx, dy);
6674  }
6675 
6676  ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (widget, &x, &y);
6677  ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, x, y);
6678 
6679  if (view->document)
6680  view_update_range_and_current_page (view);
6681 }

1933  return g_strdup (_("Go to previous page"));

1935  return g_strdup (_("Go to next page"));

1937  return g_strdup (_("Go to last page"));
1938  } else if (g_ascii_strcasecmp (name, "GoToPage") == 0) {
1939  return g_strdup (_("Go to page"));
1940  } else if (g_ascii_strcasecmp (name, "Find") == 0) {
1941  return g_strdup (_("Find"));

static char * tip_from_link ( EvView *  view,
EvLink *  link 
)
static

Definition at line 1948 of file ev-view.c.

1949 {
1950  EvLinkAction *action;
1951  EvLinkActionType type;
1952  char *msg = NULL;
1953  char *page_label;
1954  const char *title;
1955 
1956  action = ev_link_get_action (link);
1957  title = ev_link_get_title (link);
1958 
1959  if (!action)
1960  return title ? g_strdup (title) : NULL;
1961 
1962  type = ev_link_action_get_action_type (action);
1963 
1964  switch (type) {
1965  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_GOTO_DEST:
1966  page_label = ev_document_links_get_dest_page_label (EV_DOCUMENT_LINKS (view->document),
1967  ev_link_action_get_dest (action));
1968  if (page_label) {
1969  msg = g_strdup_printf (_("Go to page %s"), page_label);
1970  g_free (page_label);
1971  }
1972  break;
1973  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_GOTO_REMOTE:
1974  if (title) {
1975  msg = g_strdup_printf (_("Go to %s on file “%s”"), title,
1976  ev_link_action_get_filename (action));
1977  } else {
1978  msg = g_strdup_printf (_("Go to file “%s”"),
1979  ev_link_action_get_filename (action));
1980  }
1981  break;
1982  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_EXTERNAL_URI:
1983  msg = g_strdup (ev_link_action_get_uri (action));
1984  break;
1985  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_LAUNCH:
1986  msg = g_strdup_printf (_("Launch %s"),
1987  ev_link_action_get_filename (action));
1988  break;
1989  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_NAMED:
1990  msg = tip_from_action_named (action);
1991  break;
1992  default:
1993  if (title)
1994  msg = g_strdup (title);
1995  break;
1996  }
1997 
1998  return msg;
1999 }

6961  max_scale = ev_document_model_get_max_scale (view->model);
6962 
6963  can_zoom_in = (view->scale * ZOOM_IN_FACTOR) <= max_scale;
6964  can_zoom_out = (view->scale * ZOOM_OUT_FACTOR) > min_scale;
6965 
6966  if (can_zoom_in != view->can_zoom_in) {
6967  view->can_zoom_in = can_zoom_in;
6968  g_object_notify (G_OBJECT (view), "can-zoom-in");
6969  }

6972  view->can_zoom_out = can_zoom_out;

static void view_update_range_and_current_page ( EvView *  view)
static

Definition at line 674 of file ev-view.c.

675 {
676  gint start = view->start_page;
677  gint end = view->end_page;
678  gboolean odd_left;
679 
680  if (ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document) <= 0 ||
681  !ev_document_check_dimensions (view->document))
682  return;
683 
684  if (view->continuous) {
685  GdkRectangle current_area, unused, page_area;
686  GtkBorder border;
687  gboolean found = FALSE;
688  gint area_max = -1, area;
689  gint best_current_page = -1;
690  int i, j = 0;
691 
692  if (!(view->vadjustment && view->hadjustment))
693  return;
694 
695  current_area.x = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment);
696  current_area.width = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment);
697  current_area.y = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
698  current_area.height = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment);
699 
700  for (i = 0; i < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document); i++) {
701 
702  ev_view_get_page_extents (view, i, &page_area, &border);
703 
704  if (gdk_rectangle_intersect (&current_area, &page_area, &unused)) {
705  area = unused.width * unused.height;
706 
707  if (!found) {
708  area_max = area;
709  view->start_page = i;
710  found = TRUE;
711  best_current_page = i;
712  }
713  if (area > area_max) {
714  best_current_page = (area == area_max) ? MIN (i, best_current_page) : i;
715  area_max = area;
716  }
717 
718  view->end_page = i;
719  j = 0;
720  } else if (found && view->current_page <= view->end_page) {
721  if (is_dual_page (view, NULL) && j < 1) {
722  /* In dual mode we stop searching
723  * after two consecutive non-visible pages.
724  */
725  j++;
726  continue;
727  }
728  break;
729  }
730  }
731 
732  if (view->pending_scroll == SCROLL_TO_KEEP_POSITION ||
733  view->pending_scroll == SCROLL_TO_FIND_LOCATION) {
734  best_current_page = MAX (best_current_page, view->start_page);
735 
736  if (best_current_page >= 0 && view->current_page != best_current_page) {
737  view->current_page = best_current_page;
738  ev_view_set_loading (view, FALSE);
739  ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, best_current_page);
740  }
741  }
742  } else if (is_dual_page (view, &odd_left)) {
743  if (view->current_page % 2 == !odd_left) {
744  view->start_page = view->current_page;
745  if (view->current_page + 1 < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document))
746  view->end_page = view->start_page + 1;
747  else
748  view->end_page = view->start_page;
749  } else {
750  if (view->current_page < 1)
751  view->start_page = view->current_page;
752  else
753  view->start_page = view->current_page - 1;
754  view->end_page = view->current_page;
755  }
756  } else {
757  view->start_page = view->current_page;
758  view->end_page = view->current_page;
759  }
760 
761  if (view->start_page == -1 || view->end_page == -1)
762  return;
763 
764  if (start != view->start_page || end != view->end_page) {
765  gint i;
766 
767  for (i = start; i < view->start_page && start != -1; i++) {
768  hide_annotation_windows (view, i);
769  }
770 
771  for (i = end; i > view->end_page && end != -1; i--) {
772  hide_annotation_windows (view, i);
773  }
774 
775  ev_view_check_cursor_blink (view);
776  }
777 
778  ev_page_cache_set_page_range (view->page_cache,
779  view->start_page,
780  view->end_page);
781  ev_pixbuf_cache_set_page_range (view->pixbuf_cache,
782  view->start_page,
783  view->end_page,
784  view->selection_info.selections);
785 
786  if (ev_pixbuf_cache_get_surface (view->pixbuf_cache, view->current_page))
787  gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view));
788 }

6230 {
6231  gdouble min_width, min_height;
6232  gdouble width, height;
6233  gdouble max_scale;
6234  gdouble dpi;
6235  gint rotation;
6236  GdkScreen *screen;
6237 
6238  if (!view->document)
6239  return;
6240 
6241  rotation = ev_document_model_get_rotation (view->model);
6242  screen = gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view));
6243  dpi = ev_document_misc_get_screen_dpi (screen) / 72.0;
6244 
6245  ev_document_get_min_page_size (view->document, &min_width, &min_height);
6246  width = (rotation == 0 || rotation == 180) ? min_width : min_height;
6247  height = (rotation == 0 || rotation == 180) ? min_height : min_width;
6248  max_scale = sqrt (view->pixbuf_cache_size / (width * dpi * 4 * height * dpi));
6249 
6250  ev_document_model_set_min_scale (view->model, MIN_SCALE * dpi);
6251  ev_document_model_set_max_scale (view->model, max_scale * dpi);

7241  scale = MIN (fit_width_scale, actual_scale);
7242  }
